SEARCH
Module OOP
Package OOPProject

Class MedicalRecord

java.lang.Object
OOPProject.MedicalRecord
public class MedicalRecord extends Object
Represents a medical record in the hospital system. Each record is associated with a patient, a diagnosis, a treatment plan, and a list of prescriptions.

      Filters the list of medical records by a specified hospital ID.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
